introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Ring is a community platform designed to connect innovators, entrepreneurs, and organizations in the Cherkasy region of Ukraine. Our mission is to foster collaboration, knowledge sharing, and business opportunities within the local tech ecosystem.

forWhom.title: For Whom
forWhom.content: Ring is designed for various stakeholders in the Cherkasy tech ecosystem:
forWhom.item1: Startups and entrepreneurs looking for partnerships and resources
forWhom.item2: Established companies seeking innovation and talent

howToUse.title: How to Use
howToUse.content: Follow these steps to get the most out of Ring:
howToUse.item1: Create an account and complete your profile
howToUse.item2: Explore organizations and opportunities in the ecosystem
howToUse.item3: Connect with other members and start conversations
howToUse.item4: Post opportunities or find collaborators for your projects
howToUse.item5: Participate in community discussions and events
howToUse.item6: Stay updated with notifications and newsletters
howToUse.item7: Contribute to the growth of the local tech community

techFields.title: Technology Fields
techFields.content: Ring covers a wide range of technology fields including software development, artificial intelligence, blockchain, IoT, cybersecurity, and more. We welcome all technology enthusiasts and professionals.

userInfo.title: Welcome
userInfo.content: Welcome to Ring, {name}! We're excited to have you as part of our community.
